title: GOSHES for Philiphs Hue & LIFX
summary: With GOSHES, the light of your memory entwine to create ambience in your home.
description: With GOSHES, the light and the sound of your memory entwine to create perfect ambience in your home.We invite you to create your own dynamic scenes automatically using our sophisticated algorithm. Take GOSHES; a brand new multi-platform standard that allows you to transform your memories into powerful dynamic scenes to create perfect ambience in your home. GOSHES in-app camera:To capture perfect GOSHES, we have created a unique in-app camera that allows you to capture your new experience so that it fits our algorithm perfectly. Automatic dynamic scenes:Unlock true potential of your Philips hue and LIFX bulbs by creating your very own dynamic scenes. Our unique algorithm automatically converts your own GOSHES or any of your favorite photos into a dynamic scene. You can edit and customize the scene at any time. Powerful scene editor:We feel that lighting in our homes should be more personal. Even though our algorithm takes care of converting your GOSHES and photos into dynamic scenes, we have created a complex scene editor to give you a truly customized smart lighting experience. Enjoy this whole new level of customization in smart lighting.Pre-made dynamic scenes:Enjoy our four pre-made dynamic scenes - Rising Sun, Dancing Storm, Blazing Ocean and Peter Bic Project dynamic scene.Stay social and up to date with GOSHES:Like us on Facebook: fb.com/takegoshesFollow us on Twitter: @goshesJoin us on G+: google.com/+takegoshesYour GOSHES team.Get your monthly GOSHES Cloud subscription through the app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a price according to your country. The price of the subscription will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. GOSHES Cloud subscription renews every month.Privacy policy: http://goshes.com/ppTerms of use: http://goshes.com/tos
descriptionHTML:
With GOSHES, the light and the sound of your memory entwine to create perfect ambience in your home.

We invite you to create your own dynamic scenes automatically using our sophisticated algorithm. Take GOSHES; a brand new multi-platform standard that allows you to transform your memories into powerful dynamic scenes to create perfect ambience in your home.

GOSHES in-app camera:

To capture perfect GOSHES, we have created a unique in-app camera that allows you to capture your new experience so that it fits our algorithm perfectly.

Automatic dynamic scenes:

Unlock true potential of your Philips hue and LIFX bulbs by creating your very own dynamic scenes. Our unique algorithm automatically converts your own GOSHES or any of your favorite photos into a dynamic scene. You can edit and customize the scene at any time.

Powerful scene editor:

We feel that lighting in our homes should be more personal. Even though our algorithm takes care of converting your GOSHES and photos into dynamic scenes, we have created a complex scene editor to give you a truly customized smart lighting experience. Enjoy this whole new level of customization in smart lighting.

Pre-made dynamic scenes:

Enjoy our four pre-made dynamic scenes - Rising Sun, Dancing Storm, Blazing Ocean and Peter Bic Project dynamic scene.

Stay social and up to date with GOSHES:

Like us on Facebook: fb.com/takegoshes
Follow us on Twitter: @goshes
Join us on G+: google.com/+takegoshes

Your GOSHES team.

Get your monthly GOSHES Cloud subscription through the app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a price according to your country. The price of the subscription will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. GOSHES Cloud subscription renews every month.

Privacy policy: http://goshes.com/pp
Terms of use: http://goshes.com/tos
comments: 3 Stars for potential App seems pretty cool, but until there is full functionality I can't give it a great rating. I was able to take a picture, give the scene a name but after inputting my "new artist name" I wasn't able to continue. Please fix this, as this seems like just the app I was looking for!
Can't sign in or create account I downloaded this app and was presented with a login screen. When you try to login with Google+ it just gives you an unknown sign in error.
Failure to authorize bridge access. Won't connect to my bridge even after resting it, my phone, and my router.
Nice effects and lots for free but useless because I can't connect my Philips Hue Bridge!! :(
